msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; There are three lines on Verso.
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; almost regularly cut at the top; broken at the bottom. Kollesis at the middle of the papyrus, between col. 113 and col. 114, There is original fold at the top of col. 113 going downwards through the payments the scribe had to deal with, it is not obvious that why the scribe didn't unfold it before writing, presumably he was rushed. Several spots of salt on the top to the right side of the Verso. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. (MA)
